trans-unit.source: Supports a trigger action that resumes a paused <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 支持用于恢复暂停的触发器操作<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Use this class with an <xref:System.Windows.EventTrigger> or a <xref:System.Windows.Trigger> to resume a paused <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>.
trans-unit.target: 使用此类使用的<xref:System.Windows.EventTrigger>或<xref:System.Windows.Trigger>恢复已暂停的<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> </xref:System.Windows.Trigger> </xref:System.Windows.EventTrigger>

trans-unit.source: A ResumeStoryboard object can only resume a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> that is paused and has no effect on a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> in any other state.
trans-unit.target: 仅可以恢复 ResumeStoryboard 对象<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>会暂停，并且不起任何作用<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>中任何其他状态。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>

trans-unit.source: To be able to pause, resume, or otherwise control a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> interactively, set the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A> property of its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> and use a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ControllableStoryboardAction> object (such as <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PauseStoryboard>, ResumeStoryboard, or <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.StopStoryboard>) to control it by referencing its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 为了能够暂停、 恢复或以其他方式控制<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>以交互方式，设置<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A>属性其<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard>并用<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ControllableStoryboardAction>对象 (如<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PauseStoryboard>，ResumeStoryboard，或<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.StopStoryboard>) 来控制通过引用其<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.StopStoryboard> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PauseStoryboard> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ControllableStoryboardAction> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A> of <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> is unspecified, the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> cannot be interactively controlled after it starts.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A>的<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard>未指定，<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>在启动后不能以交互方式对其进行控制。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [How to: Use Event Triggers to Control a Storyboard After It Starts](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[如何︰ 使用事件触发器，以控制 a 情节提要后它将开始](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.ResumeStoryboard"></xref> class.
